      • solve

        public java.util.List<java.util.List<java.lang.Integer>> solve​(java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> solution)
                                                        throws java.lang.Exception
        Given the solution code, the solve operation uses one of the proposed algorithm (either five guess or the genetic one) to create the list of codes that will lead to the solution. If the algorithm is unable to find the solution in less than maxSteps steps, the returned list will contain a list composed of maxSteps codes. The operation will throw an exception in case the secret code solution is not consistent with the parameters of the current game.
        Specified by:
        solve in interface Maquina
        Parameters:
        solution - Solution code of the game to break.
        Returns:
        List of the tried codes to break the solution code, whether it's achieved or not.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - Gives exception if the solution code is not in the correct format.
